instruction: 中断骨干侧工作路径的光纤，检查是否仅骨干侧发生倒换，两端CPE侧均未发生倒换。

recover step 8 of the interrupted fiber

instruction: 在源宿端口上下发业务级别=$vc_level,时延策略=$min_latency,sla策略=$eth_sla，业务策略为发放，时延门限为无效值的业务 AS @sdh1
instruction_en: On the source port, issue service level =$VC_LEVEL, delay policy =$MIN_LATENCY, SLA policy =$ETH_SLA, business policy is issue, and the service AS@SDH1 with delay threshold of invalid value is issued
get the business primary delay AS @latency1
get the business standby delay AS @latency2
Controller main and standby replacement
Query SDH business delay normal

instruction: 在业务管理界面选中业务，点击"路由调整"，输入<路径信息>（必经节点或链路信息）（排除节点或链路信息）（路由策略）
instruction_en: Select the service in the interface of business management, click "Routing Adjustment", and enter < path information > (required node or link information) (exclude node or link information) (routing policy)

instruction: 查看预计算结果，显示调整后的业务路径
instruction_en: View the predicate results to show the adjusted business path

instruction: 使用预计算路径进行业务优化
instruction_en: Business optimization using predictor paths

instruction: 在业务详细信息界面中，看到业务路径和输入的期望路径一致
instruction_en: In the business details interface, you see that the business path matches the desired path entered

instruction: 检查原业务占用的ODUK资源释放
instruction_en: Check the release of Oduk resources occupied by the original business

instruction: 预置条件1: 清空指定信息
instruction_en: Precondition 1: clear the specified information

instruction_en: Test step 9: Change the business name and bandwidth
